reviews.review_content:
Seems rather jolly when lecturing the class.
Is not at all jolly when speaking to individuals.
Does not have office hours except 'right after class'.  Occasionally ignores e-mails.
Homework assignments are related to lecture, although they tend to be more in depth.  Exams are open-book/open-notes, and are reasonable.
Term paper "is fun!"  Take this remark with many grains of salt.
Warning:  Here there be monsters.
